name: Love To Empathy
description:
Hello, I'm Jimmy

This Game makes in Gift Jam 2020 #GiftJam.

I made this game  through to the New Year 2021 

As I know, the theme of this Jam is about to make a game for someone who is a special person to you 

(Link to that Jam: https://itch.io/jam/gift-jam-2020 )

I miss one woman that I've following her.

Now she is a Streamer at Twitch.

I followed her for about 2 years ago as Fan before she becomes a Streamer.

so that made me know about her lifestyle.
She is a funny and playful girl but adorable at the same time, and she very loves cute animals especially a cat.

She loves to play a game because Games can make her happy. 
I see it whenever she streams play game

So that made me get inspiration to make this game in this Jam, to thank and cheer up to her, and hope whoever that has played this game will understand her or someone you care about.

However, This is my first time for itch.io.

The first time, I think to make it a private project, but I rethink that I can make it a public project to make my profile, get feedback, and improve also.

I think I have a lot of things to learn about to make my profile here.

I want to make games for a living and hope it can scale up to raise my family and extend to do other dreams and other targets next. 

and I believe that it can happen and not too hard I can do it. 

If you have something whatever to suggest to me, please tell me.

Thank you :)
